content:
This morning,
I put some "whoopee boxes" while helping Glenn organize the boxes,
and he's still suspicious about that batch of goods.
info: 通用引入语-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
Only with you do I remove my mask,
Showing my most unadorned self in our conversations,
Just talking quietly like this brings me joy.
info: 通用引入语-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
Coming back for an encore? It seems my performance
has left you spellbound,
I'm honored, my dear visitor.
info: 通用引入语-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
The Jester wanders through the mortal realm with playful steps,
The cards reveal the visitor's tale,
Have you come to deal my cards, dear wanderer?
info: 通用引入语-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
Good day! <color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>,
What fun business brings you to me today?
info: 通用引入语-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
I never waste a wonderful afternoon on naps,
If I skip meals and sleep,
I can find more time for fun!
info: 通用引入语-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
But as a result,
I need to take naps more often now,
it's like eating smaller meals more frequently...
info: 通用引入语-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
"Do not go gentle into that good night,"
So says one of the rules about being merry.
info: 通用引入语-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
If the world is blown like a bubble,
Are these clouds in the sky
The delivery clouds that keep it afloat?
info: 通用引入语-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
Tick-tock, tick-tock, tick-tock,
A clown counts time's rhythm in places unseen,
Until someone breaks this worldly trance...
info: 通用引入语-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
Getting to know someone is like visiting an amusement park again and again,
Each time brings new surprises,
So, I'd love to chat with you more!
info: 通用引入语-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
It seems your path today
Will lead you to a dialogue with the clown,
How shall I guide your amusement, my dear visitor?
info: 通用引入语-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
This world brings joy everywhere,
Those clouds in the sky,
Like giant bubbles blown up from the earth.
info: 通用引入语-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
But I'm about to split my sides laughing!
Maybe I should try to hold back a bit?
Even without laughing, you can still tell how happy I am!
info: 通用引入语-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
I'm collecting rocks and branches to play with,
In my story,
They become mighty mountains and rivers through time!
info: 通用引入语-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
{惊？！}Was I still half-asleep just now?
Sorry about that, whenever I fall asleep,
I start spouting nonsense like I know everything.
info: 通用引入语-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>, I'm planning out today's schedule,
Let's make it like a roller coaster ride,
And experience all the ups and downs today has to offer!
info: 通用引入语-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
I often learn so much from little wanderers,
like how a simple pack of mud can bring a whole day's joy.
Perhaps that's how our world began too!
info: 通用引入语-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
My day got so much brighter chatting with you!
Want to do something fun together?
info: 通用引入语-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
I wonder what would happen if I hung the scare box in the water?
Would someone fish it up? Or maybe if I buried it in a hole...
Hehe~heh! Never mind, Mobai's keeping an eye on me.
info: 通用引入语-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>,
Is it morning already? {打哈欠}
My shadow told me so in my dream.
info: 通用引入语-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
Should I go help him disable the alarm?
But look at him, staying so far away from the cargo,
It's just too adorable~hahaha!
info: 通用引入语-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
Well then,
Shall we sing and dance our way into the dark night?
Let joy be the prelude to every beautiful evening!
info: 通用引入语-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
Like shadows across multiple timelines,
Perhaps we're just different moments
Meeting the same self.
info: 通用引入语-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
I'll never tire of serving you, my dear wanderer!
I am but a jester here to bring you joy, tee-hee-hee~!
info: 通用引入语-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
Gahahahaha~
I wanted to try out a rule:
To smile every time I see you,
info: 通用引入语-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
In Youshi's wonderland,
Every meeting is a reunion,
So for this reunion, what shall we chat about?
info: 通用引入语-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
Wild visitors tell tales of their revelry,
While here stands the clown, awaiting your grace.
Welcome, dear visitor - your happy plushie awaits!
info: 通用引入语-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
You've been coming to see me quite often today.
Is something troubling you?
I'm here to listen, my dear Traveler.
info: 通用引入语-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
Gahaha~ What shall we chat about?
Talking with interesting people is always such a delight,
Gahahaha~ ha!
info: 通用引入语-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语
